channel.title: Secret zone 317 (595 look alike0 by lost valentino)
channel.description:
ok i have a problem with the client
when you click on the top layer of option buttons u walk to that place instead of just opening up that window
example: i press inventory tab--> i walk to that location behind the tab and it opens that tab
this also happens with the map
how do i make it where when i press on the top layer of tabs it doesn't just make me go to that spot
here is a link to his release
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438857.msg3225034.html#msg3225034]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438857.msg3225034.html#msg3225034[/url]
